title: Third banned account.
body:
So apparently I can be perma banned from only 1 toxic game. I have been banned for 14 days and Got pissed off once. Which resulted in my perma ban? This exact same thing happened on my other 2 accounts. I Really think that People who grief and ruin the game for others should be the one being punished. Not the people who are angry with those people. Like come on dude, I got pissed off at them because They purposely Fed and Threw the game. But they Don't get punished? I Don't understand so I'm just going to stop spending money on league and just uninstall. Come on dude, {{champion:164}} just came out and you fucking ban me. I was gonna throw more money at you to get her. 

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: If it's your 3rd account I think that's telling you something

That I should actually get up to ranked in one of them? ( I legit only get to like lvl 25 and then get banned )

oce tyler1 lets go

lol, the sad part isn't you thinking you did nothing wrong, it's that this has already happened to you before and you refuse to take responsibility resulting in you not learning from your mistakes, you are responsible for everything you do regardless if you're provoked  or not and thats something you will never learn in any game, hope you get banned on your next account or the next game you jump on

Fighting is a sign of weakness and insecurity,  shows that you can't comunicate like a normal human being so you feel out of place and act like an animal, why do you think most tough guys and bullies threatens with a fight? And trust me 60% of people that say they quit league, comes back in 1 - 2 months, also "10/10 would reply again" I seggust you don't, I have better things to do then trying to teach someone what manners is because they were neglected by their parrents, no wonder you got banned
lol, you legit just gave your skype on the league boards, prepare to get ddossed xd

Report for threats buddy, Also I won't get ddosed because Skype tracers and shit don't actually work ;)
Just add me and talk %%%%.

> [{quoted}](name=EkkoIsLad,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=f8lpfsvr,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-14T06:30:36.952+0000)
>
> Report for threats buddy, Also I won't get ddosed because Skype tracers and shit don't actually work ;)
> Just add me and talk %%%%.

Lol this guy
I'll say and do whatever I want on here mate, I am banned so I have nothing to fucking lose.

Actually you won't, keep going the way you're going and you won't have relevance on the boards either.

I love how you don't touch up on the Feeders and Griefers. :)
1v1 me irl, I'm the oce tyler1
Lol needs to do its own version of bully beat down. Have the keyboard warriors meet the people face to face and see how it plays out.
That'd be fucking sick mate, I've broken someone's nose and been in a few fights this year, I'm keen. Where are we meeting?

> [{quoted}](name=EkkoIsLad,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=f8lpfsvr,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-12-16T21:32:42.650+0000)
>
> That'd be fucking sick mate, I've broken someone's nose and been in a few fights this year, I'm keen. Where are we meeting?


 I’ll have you know I graduated top of my class in the Navy Seals, and I’ve been involved in numerous secret raids on Al-Quaeda, and I have over 300 confirmed kills. I am trained in gorilla warfare and I’m the top sniper in the entire US armed forces.
I hate to be the one to tell you,  but you might in fact be an arse hole.
why the fuck are you commenting on this, This is 8 days old you cuck.

> [{quoted}](name=EkkoIsLad,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=f8lpfsvr,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-12-22T12:53:41.529+0000)

lol and you're surprised you got banned.

I'm not. Not at all.

Merry Christmas.
Merry christmas to you too. Tomorrow i'll be able to actually buy some good games! :)
FeelsBadMan
ikr, carry and prepare to be banned ;(
Enjoy your ban ;)
I will seeing I won't lose any more money :P
